attributes.background: Whilst walking my daughter from Nursery onthe 1st July 2019 my2year6month old daughter fellover whilst crossing the road.I suffer from Hip Dysplasia and need a walking stick to assist me My disability made it difficult to pick my daughter up quickly to get ourselves out of the wayof oncoming traffic

rejection.details:
We're sorry to hear about what happened to you and your daughter. 

We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Roads in the local area are the responsiblility of the local council.  You could consider contacting your local councillor, or starting a petition to the council. You can find out more here:

https://moderngov.newcastle-staffs.gov.uk/mgFindMember.aspx
https://www.newcastle-staffs.gov.uk/all-services/your-council/e-petitions
